name: Exercise 02 - Survivability
result:
If the mission can embark 10L of water, 20.3kg of food and the water recycler can do 2 water cycles... With 5 crew members, there is enough water for 2 day(s) and enough food for 8 day(s).
Survivable days: 2
If the mission can embark 14L of water, 56.3kg of food and the water recycler can do 10 water cycles... With 7 crew members, there is enough water for 10 day(s) and enough food for 16 day(s).
Survivable days: 10
If the mission can embark 12L of water, 37.5kg of food and the water recycler can do 26 water cycles... With 3 crew members, there is enough water for 52 day(s) and enough food for 25 day(s).
Survivable days: 25

name: Exercise 03 - Ownership
result:
Here is the contract of Paul:
I am honored to join the space program of The Union and I am willing to risk my life to explore space.
Therefore, I renounce every right I have to sue The Union in the event of my death.
Signed: Astronaut Paul
- And here is the declaration of Astronaut Paul, ready to send to the press:
I am trilled that I have been chosen in the space program of The Union.
I will make The Union and my family proud by being a good astronaut, dedicated to the exploration of space.
Cheers and see you on Venus !
Signed: Astronaut Paul
Number of Helmets: 8 Number of Suits: 21
Here is the contract of Laura:
I am honored to join the space program of The Union and I am willing to risk my life to explore space.
Therefore, I renounce every right I have to sue The Union in the event of my death.
Signed: Astronaut Laura
- And here is the declaration of Astronaut Laura, ready to send to the press:
I am trilled that I have been chosen in the space program of The Union.
I will make The Union and my family proud by being a good astronaut, dedicated to the exploration of space.
Cheers and see you on Venus !
Signed: Astronaut Laura
Number of Helmets: 6 Number of Suits: 19
